title: Vaping - The good, bad, and ugly after gastric bypass?
text: Folks, Im 100 days post Lap OAGB. Lost 66 pounds or 30 kilos in the time period. I used to smoke, but quit it 2 months before the surgery. There are days I feel like restarting cigarette smoking but when I read about possible issues, I dont go for it. But I want to have something similar to smoking but way safer. Given that Im 100 days post surgery recovering and losing weight, can I take up vaping? Is vaping better than smoking? What probable or possible risks are there in vaping after gastric bypass?
relevance_reason: Strong bariatric context but no direct PBH or hypoglycemia discussion.
